title: You scratch your back, I'll scratch mine
description: The Hundred Draft, breaking news from Greg and Fe, some homework for Jimmy and Mark Wood news. Plus new laws, another trip to The Tat Modern, Jack Russell Stories, Thunderbirds and a surprise appearance from a former England captain.
author: BBC Radio 5 Live
excerpt: The Hundred Draft, breaking news from Greg and Fe, homework for Jimmy, and Mark Wood news
text: The Hundred Draft, breaking news from Greg and Fe, some homework for Jimmy and Mark Wood news. Plus new laws, another trip to The Tat Modern, Jack Russell Stories, Thunderbirds and a surprise appearance from a former England captain.
